content.rendered:
2023 World Cup Finals Rugby Package Rates

The rates below are based on a six-night package with first class accommodations, airport transfers, and a match day experience to the World Cup Final. However, our specialty is bespoke travel packages tailored to fit you perfectly. To customize the rugby trip of a lifetime, please contact one of our sports travel specialists at 1-800-465-1765 (weekdays between 8:30 a.m. and 5:00 p.m. CST). Or, fill out the information we need to build your custom trip request and one of our sports travel specialists will contact you.

Hotel PackageRoom CategoryPackages From
6-Night Finals Package -
Hotel de Crillon, A Rosewood Hotel		Standard Room$9,845
10-Night Semis and Finals Package -
Hotel de Crillon, A Rosewood Hotel		Standard RoomCall for Rates
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. A 50% deposit will hold your spot. The balance will not be due until 90 days prior. Rates include all local and state taxes. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking.
